casebody.data:
In re BROUGHTON. No. 240P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Celeste G. Broughton, for Broughton, Celeste G. Kenneth R. Murphy, III, for Wake County.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of July 2015 by to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
